import axios from "axios"; import { Component } from "react"; import { Link, useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import "./CatAdd.scss"; const origin = "http://localhost:9001"; function CatAdd() { // useHistory can only be used in functional component // can only use useHistory hook to manually change router instead of using Link const history = useHistory(); submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); axios .post(`${origin}/cats`, { name: e.target.catName, age: e.target.age, gender: e.target.gender, health: e.target.health, personality: e.target.personality, contact: e.target.contact, breed: e.target.breed, city: e.target.city, }) .then((response) => { // only navigate to the newly uploaded video detail page when successfully uploaded }); }; return (

Name

Age

Breed

Personality

Health

Gender

City

Contact

); } export default CatAdd;
